title: Microsoft Teams for Remote Tech Employees

courseOutline.title: Microsoft Teams for Remote Tech Employees
courseOutline.description: This course is designed to provide remote tech employees with a comprehensive understanding of Microsoft Teams, enabling them to communicate effectively and collaborate efficiently.
courseOutline.goal: Help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.

sections.title: Introduction to Microsoft Teams
sections.description: Overview of the platform and its features

sections.title: Setting Up Your Account
sections.description: Guidance on account creation and initial setup

sections.title: Scheduling and Joining Meetings
sections.description: How to schedule meetings, join them, and manage participants

sections.title: Using Meeting Features
sections.description: Exploration of features like chat, screen sharing, and recording

sections.title: Working with Channels and Teams
sections.description: Overview of how to organize workspaces and channels

sections.title: Using Chat for Communication
sections.description: Best practices for using chat effectively

chapters.title: Integrating Microsoft Teams into Your Workflow

sections.title: Connecting with Other Office 365 Apps
sections.description: How to integrate Teams with other applications like Outlook and SharePoint
